restaurants.name: Ariccia Cucina Italiana
restaurants.review: Very authentic and modern Italian spot with a specialty in porchetta

restaurants.name: Nakamura
restaurants.review: One of the best places to get ramen in NYC!

restaurants.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
restaurants.review: Chipotle sometimes misses but is usually a hit

restaurants.name: Junior Colombian Burger
restaurants.review: I could eat two dozen empanadas from here if I tried

restaurants.name: Savanh Thai Kitchen
restaurants.review: It can be a bit expensive, but nothing beats the veggie spring rolls and the yellow curry

restaurants.name: The Southern Kitchen & Bar
restaurants.review: The fried chicken and gouda grits with mustard greens was probably the best thing I have ever tasted.
